tools.name: Contrast Checker
tools.desc: Check the contrast between two colors to ensure readability.

tools.name: Color Blindness Simulator
tools.desc: Simulate color blindness to see how your design looks to those with color vision deficiencies.

tools.name: Screen Reader
tools.desc: Test your website with a screen reader to ensure it's accessible to all users.

tools.name: Keyboard Navigation
tools.desc: Navigate your website using only a keyboard to ensure it's accessible to all users.

tools.name: Focus Indicator
tools.desc: Check the focus indicator on your website to ensure it's visible and accessible.

tools.name: Skip Links
tools.desc: Add skip links to your website to help users navigate more easily.
